skills.answer: Day to day I build with **React + TypeScript** on the front end and **.NET 8/ASP.NET** for APIs. Data lives in **PostgreSQL, SQL Server, or MongoDB**. I ship through **Azure DevOps CI/CD**, containerize with **Docker**, and lean on **TailwindCSS/MUI** for UI work. Comfortable jumping between frontend polish and backend architecture.

experience.answer: **Baltimore Life Insurance (Oct 2024‚ÄìPresent):** lead modernization of internal apps, build secure document workflows, and mentor on .NET/React best practices. **Soup Agency (2023‚Äì2024):** shipped high-converting marketing sites in React/Svelte, owned performance budgets, and integrated Shopify/WordPress stacks. **Audigent (2021‚Äì2023):** hybrid IT/dev role‚Äîbuilt internal JS tools, managed DNS, and partnered with DevOps on multi-cloud infra.

projects.answer: Highlights: rebuilt a legacy PII document system into **.NET + React** with role-based access and signed URLs; designed a secure file delivery service that cut manual handling to zero; built an internal data transfer tool that moves batches between **AWS + MongoDB** with audit logs; and crafted this portfolio experience. More context at [chasedurrett.dev](https://www.chasedurrett.dev).

contact.answer: Email **chase@cdinfosec.com** or call/text **(817) 880-3274**. Portfolio: [chasedurrett.dev](https://www.chasedurrett.dev). Happy to talk about roles, projects, or collaborations.

about.answer: I'm Chase Durrett, a full-stack developer who enjoys untangling legacy systems, tightening security, and polishing UI details. I like pairing with design, writing readable code, and leaving teams with clearer docs than they started with.

education.answer: BFA, **University of Oklahoma** (2018) ‚Äî Kennedy Center Honoree, National Mark Twain Award. **Web Development** certification at **DevMountain** (2020). Additional training: **Google Cybersecurity** and **ISC2 CC** coursework.

location.answer: Based in the United States and fully set up for remote collaboration across time zones.

hobbies.answer: I like tinkering with security labs, exploring new frameworks on small side builds, and keeping notes on what works so I can share with teammates.

availability.answer: Open to new roles and freelance work. Reach me at **chase@cdinfosec.com** or **(817) 880-3274** to compare needs and timelines.

baltimore.answer: At **Baltimore Life Insurance** I'm leading a migration to **.NET + React**, building signed-URL document security, and shipping updates that thousands of agents rely on. Focus areas: performance, security, and clearer operational tooling.

soup.answer: At **Soup Agency** I built client sites in **React/Svelte** with **TailwindCSS**, integrated storefronts on **Shopify** and **WordPress**, and focused on page speed and conversion-friendly UX.

audigent.answer: At **Audigent** I built internal JS tools that talked to **AWS + MongoDB**, maintained DNS, and partnered with DevOps on AWS/Azure/GCP deployments. Also shipped small frontend features in Next.js.

help.answer: Ask about my **skills**, **experience**, **projects**, or how to **contact me**. If you want something else, try a few keywords and I'll point you to specifics.
